analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/2/0xbb1f24c0c1554b9990222f036b0aad6ee4caec29.sol:
	Contract CryptosoulToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/2/0xbb1f24c0c1554b9990222f036b0aad6ee4caec29.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
